com.samskivert.depot

Class Ops

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samskivert.depot.Ops

  • public class Ops
extends Object
    Provides static methods for operator construction that don't fit nicely into the fluent style. For example: Ops.and(), Ops.or() and Ops.not().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ops()
